battleship.model

Class Place

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship.model.Place

  • public class Place
extends java.lang.Object
    A place in a game board. Each place has a pair of 1-based indices--- x for column and y for row---that uniquely identify it in the board. A place can be placed on by a battleship.
    Author:
    cheon
    See Also:
    Board

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int x
      1-based column index of this place.
      int y
      1-based row index of this place.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Place(int x, int y, Board battleBoard)
      Create a new place with the given indices belonging to the given board.

    • Field Detail

      • x

        public final int x
        1-based column index of this place.

      • y

        public final int y
        1-based row index of this place.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Place

        public Place(int x,
             int y,
             Board battleBoard)
        Create a new place with the given indices belonging to the given board.
        Parameters:
        x - 1-based column index of the place to be created
        y - 1-based row index of the place to be created
        battleBoard - board to which the created place belongs

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Return the 1-based column index of this place.
        Returns:
        Column index of this place.

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Return the 1-based row index of this place.
        Returns:
        Row index of this place.

      • isHit

        public boolean isHit()
        Is this place hit?
        Returns:
        True if this place was shot; false otherwise

      • isHitShip

        public boolean isHitShip()
        Is this place hit and does it have a ship?
        Returns:
        True if this place has a ship and was shot; false otherwise

      • hit

        public void hit()
        Hit this place.

      • hasShip

        public boolean hasShip()
        Does this place have a ship?
        Returns:
        True if a ship is placed on this place; false otherwise

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Is this place empty? I.e., no ship placed on it?
        Returns:
        True if no ship is placed on this place; false otherwise

      • placeShip

        public void placeShip(Ship ship)
        Place the given ship on this place.
        Parameters:
        ship - Ship to be placed on this place
        See Also:
        Ship

      • ship

        public Ship ship()
        Return the ship placed on this place. Return null if no ship is placed on this place.
        Returns:
        Battleship placed on this place or null

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset this place. This method clears the shot made on this place and remove the ship placed on it.
